# Quality Checklist: Enhanced UI Feedback

**Purpose**: Ensure enhanced UI feedback features meet quality standards for user experience, performance, and reliability
**Created**: 2025-01-29
**Feature**: [specs/008-enhanced-ui-feedback/spec.md](specs/008-enhanced-ui-feedback/spec.md)

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/speckit.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## UI Responsiveness

- [x] QCK001 Progress indicators update smoothly during download operations without blocking the UI
- [x] QCK002 Status messages appear within 100ms of status changes
- [x] QCK003 UI remains responsive during long-running download operations (no freezing)
- [x] QCK004 Progress bars accurately reflect download progress and completion status

## Error Handling & User Feedback

- [x] QCK005 Error messages are clear, actionable, and displayed prominently
- [ ] QCK006 Network errors show appropriate retry options and status information
- [ ] QCK007 Configuration errors provide helpful guidance for resolution
- [ ] QCK008 File system errors (permissions, disk space) are handled gracefully with user feedback

## Information Display

- [x] QCK009 Download statistics (files downloaded, time elapsed, success rate) are displayed clearly
- [x] QCK010 Current operation status is always visible and updated in real-time
- [x] QCK011 File names and sizes are shown during download progress
- [ ] QCK012 Completion summaries include relevant metrics and next steps

## Performance & Reliability

- [x] QCK013 UI feedback doesn't impact download performance (memory usage < 50MB additional)
- [x] QCK014 Status updates don't cause UI lag or stuttering
- [x] QCK015 Feedback system handles high-frequency status updates without issues
- [ ] QCK016 Memory leaks are prevented in long-running download sessions

## User Experience

- [x] QCK017 Progress feedback matches user expectations from similar applications
- [ ] QCK018 Error states provide clear recovery paths
- [ ] QCK019 Success states provide positive feedback and next action guidance
- [ ] QCK020 UI feedback is consistent across different download scenarios

## Accessibility

- [x] QCK021 Progress indicators are accessible to screen readers
- [x] QCK022 Error messages have appropriate color contrast and sizing
- [ ] QCK023 Status information is available in text form for accessibility tools
- [ ] QCK024 Keyboard navigation works with enhanced feedback elements

## Testing & Validation

- [x] QCK025 Unit tests cover all feedback display logic
- [x] QCK026 Integration tests verify end-to-end feedback flow
- [ ] QCK027 Performance tests confirm UI responsiveness under load
- [ ] QCK028 User acceptance testing validates feedback effectiveness

## Notes

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
- Link to relevant resources or documentation
- Items are numbered sequentially for easy reference
